* Contact: Daller
* Brand: Dell
* Make : XPS
* Model: M1330

=== Ubuntu Lucid 10.04 Issues ===
* Suspend doesn't work: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/499221|bug #499221]]</nowiki>
* Internal mic works after configuration: <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=8265132#post8265132|forum post]]</nowiki>
* Fingerprint reader: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/gnome-control-center/+bug/346083|Bug #346083]]</nowiki>

=== Ubuntu Karmic 9.10 Issues ===
* Fingerprint reader untested
* Internal mic works after configuration. <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=8265132#post8265132]]</nowiki>

=== Ubuntu Jaunty 9.04 Issues ===
* Intel i965 freezes starting on April 3rd: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/xserver-xorg-video-intel/+bug/359392 | Bug 359392]]</nowiki>
* Fingerprint reader: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/gnome-control-center/+bug/346083 | Bug 346083]]</nowiki>
* Networkmanager applet cannot connect to WPA2 home network (intel 4965): <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/348275 | Bug 348275]]</nowiki>
* Microphone capture very low volume: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/pulseaudio/+bug/275998 | Bug 275998]]</nowiki>
* Multimedia keys do not work properly <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/hotkeys/+bug/226509 | Bug 226509]]</nowiki>

=== Ubuntu Intrepid 8.10 Issues ===
* ''Hard drive constantly spins up/down: Although its not Dell-specific issue, it occurs on this model as well. See bug https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/acpi-support/+bug/59695 ''(fixed in recent updates)
* Dell XPS 1330 microphone not sensitive enough. See https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/pulseaudio/+bug/275998
* Eject button doesn't work. See https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bug/180866 (Works For Me - LukeFaraone)
* Screen brightness double level changes. See https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/hal/+bug/207473
* Fingerprint reader: read this guide: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ThinkFinger and http://www.thinkwiki.org/wiki/How_to_enable_the_fingerprint_reader_with_ThinkFinger#Intrepid

=== Ubuntu Hardy 8.04 Issues ===
* Hard drive constantly spins up/down: Although its not Dell-specific issue, it occurs on this model as well. See http://duopetalflower.blogspot.com/2008/04/harddrive-killer-bug-workaround-for.html for solution (read comments to that post!)
* Suspend/Resume: worked out of the box, but USB devices and webcam were not working properly after suspend. To fix, add: `SUSPEND_MODULES="ehci_hcd uvcvideo"` to /etc/pm/config.d/WORKAROUND file (it may not exist - create it then). More info at https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/211572. Still pending:
*** '''Fixed:''' cpu_freq is not restored for second CPU core: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/183033
* (Kubuntu specific): Pressing "Calculator" button crashes kded - https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/kubuntu-meta/+bug/226496
* Multimedia keys: AudioBack keys report several presses even when touched once - https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bug/226509
* Fingerprint reader: read this guide: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ThinkFinger
* Portrait display mode suport (with nVidia):
### `sudo nvidia-xconfig --randr-rotation`
### Restart your X
### Now you can rotate your display using `xrandr` or `nvidia-settings` (new menu entry will appear)
* Disable touchpad while typing: See http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=271052

=== Ubuntu Gutsy 7.10 Issues ===
* Compiz can't be enabled on Ubuntu Gutsy because the intel video chipset was blacklisted (https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/xserver-xorg-video-intel/+bug/148247)
*** ''Blacklisted PCIID '8086:2a02' found''
* Integrated microphone is not working (https://bugs.launchpad.net/dell/+bug/147682)
* Internal speakers volume is too low (https://bugs.launchpad.net/dell/+bug/163360)
* Second headphone jack is not working (https://bugs.launchpad.net/dell/+bug/163362)
* Sleep mode is not always working (https://bugs.launchpad.net/dell/+bug/164974)
* Network often fails on resume (https://bugs.launchpad.net/dell/+bug/172522)

| <-4> '''Hardware Information'''
|}
** VGA compatible controller: Intel Corporation Mobile GM965/GL960 Integrated Graphics Controller (rev 0c) 
*** Alternatively: VGA compatible controller: nVidia Corporation GeForce 8400M GS (rev a1)
** Audio device: Intel Corporation 82801H (ICH8 Family) HD Audio Controller (rev 02)
** IDE interface: Intel Corporation 82801HBM/HEM (ICH8M/ICH8M-E) IDE Controller (rev 02)
** SATA controller: Intel Corporation 82801HBM/HEM (ICH8M/ICH8M-E) SATA AHCI Controller (rev 02)
** FireWire (IEEE 1394): Ricoh Co Ltd R5C832 IEEE 1394 Controller (rev 05)
** Ethernet controller: Broadcom Corporation NetLink BCM5906M Fast Ethernet PCI Express (rev 02)
** Network controller: Intel Corporation PRO/Wireless 3945ABG Network Connection (rev 02)
*** Alternatively: Intel Corporation PRO/Wireless 4965 AG or AGN [Kedron] Network Connection (rev 61)
